alert.note: Alert for Cumberland (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 6:40PM CST until January 01 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CST FOR SOUTHERN CUMBERLAND COUNTY... At 640 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Crossville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crossville, Fairfield Glade, Crab Orchard, Lake Tansi, Cumberland Mountain State Park and Indian Rock Lake. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 321 and 339. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
